definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: maneh, mina, a weight (v. BH; OAram. [[מנה]] SAC:75 Lzb:313);—abs. Da 5:25, Da 5:25, Da 5:26, v. ClGann:JAs Juillet-Août, 1886, 36 ff. Nö:ZA i. 414 f. Dr al.; its connexion in Dn with [[מְנׇה]] is due to word-play; v. also [[פְּרֵס]], [[תְּקֵל]]. p. 1108, 1118
